known_issues: Production/live deployment is failing with a deployment error (Version 22).

existing_features.title: Investigate the current “Failed to deploy to production: Deployment error” for Version 22 and apply the minimal code/config changes required so the project can successfully deploy to the Live (production) environment.

Add a developer-facing deployment preflight check (documentation and/or script) that can be run before attempting a Live deployment to catch the specific class of failure that caused the Version 22 production deployment error.

projectName: Fix production deployment failure and re-deploy Version 22 to live
